thread.title: Georgia sheriff's deputy arrested on child molestation charges
thread.title_full: Georgia sheriff's deputy arrested on child molestation charges

author: Lauren Foreman
title: Georgia sheriff's deputy arrested on child molestation charges
text:
A Whitfield County sheriff's deputy was arrested on child molestation charges after a two-county investigation.
Justin Litzenberg, 23, of Dalton, was arrested Thursday on three counts of child molestation, false imprisonment and cruelty to children in the first degree, according to the Bartow County Sheriff's Office.
Both Whitfield and Bartow county sheriff’s offices investigated the deputy after the Bartow criminal investigations division found out about a possible child molestation that occurred there in 2016.
Litzenberg is being held in the Bartow jail. His bond hearing is set for later Friday.
He is the second Whitfield County worker accused of child molestation recently.
RELATED: Firefighter who works as clown faces child molestation charges
William Taylor White, 34, of Chatsworth, was arrested Saturday at the Whitfield County Fire Department, where he works, Sheriff Scott Chitwood said in a news release.
White is also part of the department’s 16-member “Clown Posse,” which has performed recently in local elementary schools to teach kids about fire safety. He is known as “Spladder” the clown.
— Staff writer Ellen Eldridge contributed to this article.
In other news:
Drivers are concerned about the area around one of the biggest construction zones in the metro. www.accessatlanta.com
